original_text: God had already decided to prepare something better for all of us. As a result, those people did not receive everything until we could join with them.
korean_text: 이는 하나님이 우리를 위하여 더 좋은 것을 예비하셨은즉 우리가 아니면 그들로 온전함을 이루지 못하게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: those people did not receive everything
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 모든 것을 받지 못했습니다

sentences.original_text: until we could join with them
